title: Evaluation of the functional properties of a protein isolate from Arthrospira maxima and its application in a meat sausage
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mariana Inés Acateca-Hernández, Aleida S. Hernández-Cázares, Juan Valente Hidalgo-Contreras, María Teresa Jiménez-Munguía, Ma. Antonieta Ríos-Corripio
